message: I dash outside and look around for Mink.
There. He's already halfway down the street.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What the hell...?!"
I expected this, but still.
I run after him. Once I catch up, I slow to a walk and follow him silently.
It's pointless to ask questions. All Mink wants is for me to shut up and obey him.
I don't like it one bit, but I know all too well that nothing I say will get through.
So I have no choice but to do what he wants.
Mink leads us away from the main street, through narrow alleys and side streets to a secluded block.
If I had to guess, we must be near Platinum Jail's outer wall. It's a quiet area. Instead of stores or residences, there are rows and rows of warehouses.
Why are we here? Could it have something to do with that phone call?
Mink approaches one of the warehouses, goes to the back door, and briskly operates his Coil.
When the door opens, I can immediately tell there's someone inside.
A shape stands in the doorway.
For a second, I tense. But then...

name: ミンクチームＡ
message: "Boss!"
A smiling man shouts cheerfully.

name: ミンク
message: "Keep it down."
With a glare, Mink waves the man aside.
I quickly step through the door.
